Articles.Content:
I like mystery goo containers for being able to transmit a decent amount of science at a decent efficiency. What I don't like about it is the fact that it must be mounted radially. This way, I have to add another container for balance. If there was an in-line option (I wouldn't care where it appears on the tech tree), life would be made a little easier for me.

BTW, the devs must have discovered the secret to making games addicting with career mode.
